Title: Stepping into the Shadows
Description:
Their ranks have been thinned, and their corpses cleansed. You have done well.

<Maiev shifts her weight, looking towards the path leading into Shadow Hold.>

Come, $n. We must find what lurks below and put an end to it.
ObjectivesText: Navigate through Shadow Hold with Maiev Shadowsong, dealing with threats along the way.

Objectives.Text: Discover what lurks in the depths of Shadow Hold
